name: Shade
evidence:
EMF Level 5 
Ghost Writing 
Freezing Temperatures
trait:
Schades have a lower activity over all, they won't interact with objects if a player is in the same room (even candles and the writing book!). They have a much lower chance to perform ghost events, For every 1% of average sanity lost, ghost event chance is increased by 2% (starting with 0% change at 100% sanity). A Shade can't start a hunt if a player is nearby. 

The Shade prefers to do the airball event. **(p.airball)**, also it prefers to be in the shadow form during ghost events. 

Can Hunt at 35% Sanity.
ability: The Shade has no hidden abilities.
